Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from debt net of issuance costs
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: net proceeds payments related to stock based award activities
Repayment of Debt: repayments of debt and capital lease obligations
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): acquisitions net of cash acquired and purchases of intangible and other assets
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from collection of notes receivable
proceeds from payments for securities purchased under agreements to resell
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued revenue share
increase decrease in collateral held under securities lending
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in prepaid revenue share expenses and other assets
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred income taxes and tax credits
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization and impairment of intangible assets
depreciation and impairment on disposition of property and equipment
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: debt and equity securities gain loss
gain loss on marketable and non marketable investments net
gain losson marketableand nonmarketable investments net
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities
